title: Understanding Autism Spectrum Disorder
text: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) is a complex condition that affects how a person communicates and interacts with others. It is important to understand the key characteristics of ASD to identify it correctly.

title: Characteristics of ASD
text: ASD is characterized by challenges with social skills, repetitive behaviors, speech, and nonverbal communication. It is a developmental disorder that affects the brain.

hintAnswer: developmental disorder of the brain that causes impairment in behavior, communication, interaction with others, and learning
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)?
choices: abnormality in the fifteenth chromosome that results in a genetic disorder affecting metabolism, behavior, and development
developmental disorder of the brain that causes impairment in behavior, communication, interaction with others, and learning
